Description.Text: Part of the historic Grosvenor Estate, this beautiful Georgian building is Go Natives latest premium property. A 300 year-old mews in Mayfair, it has been sympathetically renovated to provide one and two-bedroom suites - each boasting their own theme and named in honour of a notable architect. Populated with British-built furniture, feature fabrics and artistic flashes of English humour, it is both comforting and comfortable. Perfect for business professionals and discerning city visitors, these new properties offer a luxury haven in London's ultimate postcode. Lees Place is also just a short walk from Marble Arch and Bond Street underground stations making it extremely well connected in the bustling city of London.
Lees Place is also just a short walk from Marble Arch and Bond Street underground stations making it extremely well connected in the bustling city of London.

Classic Apartment - Offering more room, not one room, the Classic one-bed apartments at Mayfair are ideal urban spaces. Consisting of separate living and sleeping quarters for an enhanced city living experience, each provides privacy and comfort in a stylish home-away-from-home apartment. For even more space please book One Bedroom Premium Apartments. Desk Laundry Facilities Lounge Area Telephone Toaster Kitchen Double Bed Microwave Cable/Satellite TV Weekly Room Service Shower - separate Lift/Elevator Access Tea/Coffee Making Fridge - Full size Cots Available Alarm Clock DVD Player Non-Smoking Television Wireless Internet Dishwasher Linen and Towels Provided
Premium Apartment - The premium one-bed apartments are furnished in line with the Classic apartments but benefit from additional floorspace and a separate dining area.. Separate living and sleeping quarters for an enhanced city living experience, each provides privacy and comfort in a stylish home-away-from-home apartment. For two separate bedrooms and a wealth of space please book Two Bedroom Apartments Desk Laundry Facilities Lounge Area Telephone Toaster Kitchen Double Bed Microwave Cable/Satellite TV Weekly Room Service Shower - separate Lift/Elevator Access Tea/Coffee Making Fridge - Full size Cots Available Alarm Clock DVD Player Non-Smoking Television Wireless Internet Dishwasher Linen and Towels Provided
Premium Apartment - As with the studio and family-sized properties, these two-bedroom apartments give generous city space for impressive value. Consisting of two, separate double-bedrooms and additional living quarters, plus a kitchen and a bathroom, they are the ideal solution for families and groups of three or four.
